params._index: The index of the ticket to return

returns._0: The number of images associated with a given address

getTicket(address,uint8).notice: Returns the ticket at index in the ownership array

getTicketCount(address).notice: Returns the number of tickets associated with the given address

uploadTicket(string,string).notice: associate an ticket entry with the owner i.e. sender address

userdoc.notice: This contract represents a registry of ticket ownership. Due to storage limitations, tickets are stored on IPFS. The IPFS hash along with metadata are stored onchain.
